ingredients.content: 400 g pumpkin flesh, cut into pieces
½ tsp salt, plus extra to taste

preparations.content: Place oil and fresh ginger into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>, then sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add pumpkin, potatoes, cashew nuts, salt, white pepper and water, cook <b>15 min/100°C/speed 1<b>, then blend <b>1 min/speed 5<b>-<b>10, increasing speed gradually.<b> Adjust seasoning to taste and serve hot.
